channel.title: Articles on Jared Connor
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Jared Connor

item.title: Intro: Classification
item.description: Suppose you are a doctor. Someone rolls into your operating room. Say that the nurse who was carrying their packet of info got sidetracked by the latest episode of Game of Thrones. Again, to further simplify our reality, say they are green in the face. From your substantive experience as a doctor you know their condition could be caused by exactly three things: a stroke, a drug overdose, or cancer.

item.title: First of Many
item.description: Welcome! Well it’s awesome to see that you’ve found it here. After quite some time, I finally was able to publish this via Hugo. That was a headache in itself because Github pages and Hugo don’t play nicely with each other, but nonetheless. So this site is going to hold basically everything I’m working on and want everyone to see. Publishing content is a great thing to do in the age where your website/blog basically is your new business card.
